body: Hey guys, my name is Curbi and I'm new to both the server and the forums. Ask me anything :D
body_tagged: Hey guys, my name is Curbi and I'm new to both the server and the forums. Ask me anything :D
title: Hello, I'm Curbi - AMA

replies.body:
Welcome Curbi! Feel free to ask the staff any questions you may have, they are very helpful!
As for the question:
Why is your name Curbi?
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome Curbi! Feel free to ask the staff any questions you may have, they are very helpful!
As for the question:
Why is your name Curbi?

replies.body:
Thank you! A few months ago, I started getting into House music and I found a song by a 16-year-old producer called Curbi, his tracks are amazing so I decided to use Curbi as an IGN just so I can have it in case he becomes famous, I think it's an awesome name nonetheless.

If you're interested, listen to this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MoaDnuD3ETY

What is your favorite animal? :)

replies.body: Hello and thank you, my favorite animal is the lion :)
